pos review: Good location and amenities at the hotel
The location of the place was amazing and with a good view
neg review:
The staff weren't cleaning the room efficiently. For example, when it comes to cleaning the bed, they just put the blanket and don't care whether there's anything under the blanket such as shirts, charge and others. 
And even though it's safe but there is no camera's in the elevators and stairs where there should be.

pos review: WiFi was excellent.  Location good.  Staff mediocre.  Lobby staff was much better than spa staff.
neg review: It was odd that you had to take your hotel towel to the spa.  Nobody smiles.  Nobody is friendly.  I think it's more of a cultural thing but a smile and "hello" and a response of "you're welcome" goes a long way and nobody says any of that.
Even though there were free rooms, the reception informed us to pay for half day to check us in just 2 hours before their check-in time.

pos review: A clean and large room. Good spa services.
neg review: I do not recommend the hotel's restaurant.

pos review:
Room is clean. 
Friendly staff. 
Tasty in-room food.
neg review: I booked a room in the Viktoria & SPA hotel only for one night with a big hope to use their spa facilities. However, my hope wasn't fulfilled, as their swimming pool area, jacuzzi and sauna/steam room all were full up with about 20-30 people. During these COVID-19 times I expected to see some restrictions in place on amount of people can attend spa zone.
Early entry was for half price.
